```py
from numpy.random import MT19937
from numpy.random import RandomState

rs = RandomState(12345)
mt19937 = MT19937()
mt19937.state = rs.get_state()
rs2 = RandomState(mt19937)

# Same output
rs.standard_normal()
rs2.standard_normal()

rs.random()
rs2.random()

rs.standard_exponential()
rs2.standard_exponential() 
```
